person.aboutMe: Highly motivated and results-oriented professional with 10+ years of experience in graphic and web design, specializing in modern UI/UX principles and full-stack development. Seeking to leverage skills in a challenging environment.

jobExperience.title: WEB DESIGNER
jobExperience.description: Led the redesign of the company's flagship e-commerce platform, resulting in a 25% increase in conversion rates.

jobExperience.title: GRAPHIC DESIGNER
jobExperience.description: Developed over 50 brand identity packages for international clients, ensuring high standards of visual consistency.

jobExperience.title: MARKETING MANAGER
jobExperience.description: Managed digital marketing campaigns, successfully optimizing content for SEO and increasing organic traffic.
